project.name: obsd
project.description: Running Gentoo on an OpenBSD base system.

longdescription.p: An effort to provide a true Gentoo experience on top of a base OpenBSD system. The first step was to create a tarball of portage + support apps so that portage would function on OpenBSD; that has been finished for a while. The next step was to create an iso to make installation easier; also finished.
This project is currently dead. If you want to work on it, please send an e-mail to Gentoo/*BSD team.
longdescription.note: Currently this project lacks maintainer, developers, lead, and is almost dead. New developers should probably restart the work on this from scratch, also if it's probably possible to reuse part of the work done for Gentoo/FreeBSD and Gentoo/NetBSD.
